data.text: @EU_Commission so your #EU4citizens? Smokers are citizens and get listened too, now it's time to listen to #vapers #NOecigBAN
@EU_Commission je vape depuis 3 mois après 22 ans de tabagisme: ne me condamner pas
@EU_Commission why you dont ask vapers of #ecigs whats the best for them? #EP did it but used only a part of it. But better than #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @Hifistud Well, we think the EU is murderously corrupt. Hope that helps. #EUisnot4citizens #EUecigban joke -> #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission What can Europe do for me? It can criminalise me for choosing a safer alternative to smoking. What do I think? It's fascism.
@EU_Commission #eu4citizens nous vous fournissons avec des faits à propos de #ecigs et #NOecigBAN Quand allez-vous écouter?
@EU_Commission #eu4citizens wir liefern ihnen dauernd Fakten über #ecigs und #NOecigBAN Wann beginnen Sie mal zuzuhören?
@EU_Commission #eu4citizens we keep providing you with facts about #ecigs and #NOecigBAN When are you going to listen?
@EU_Commission si vous trouvez que mon vapo sent le tabac une directive ORL ne serait pas de trop ! #ecigBAN
@EU_Commission si en voyant mon itaste vous pensez a une Kmel c'est une directive ophtalmologique qu'il faut voter #ecigBAN
@EU_Commission Why do u want to ban #ecigs? Do they leave u short of money? #NOeuEcigBan #NOecigBan

@EU_Commission TPD all a Haze 

Earth Brother on the other hand is ALL Halcyon Haze 

And you think I'm not making sense.

#NOecigBAN
@EU_Commission Support 1000s of craftsmen making great ecig products in EU. Why support a Lithuanian death factory? #NOecigBAN #EU4Citizens

@EU_Commission why you're so afraid of my e-torch with some extra. It's mostly harmless say #NOecigBAN could help you understand
@EU_Commission Please remember "NOTHING ABOUT US WITHOUT US!!! " #NOecigBAN
@EU_Commission My thoughts? Demonstrate that there is democracy in #EU and that you care about people's lives with #NOecigBAN

@EU_Commission  recuerda somos votantes. Remember we are voters
#NOecigBAN

@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN 

My Diary 2013

Smoker -> ecig user -> vaper -> criminal

->Smoker?
 
#NOecigBAN #EU4citizens #vapersofeurope

BTW, it is Saturday, somebody woke up? Go home, take a good rest, we want an AWAKE @EU_Commission  on Monday #NOecigBAN #ecigs

@EU_Commission
